CrashPlan-Pro.description: CrashPlan PRO/Small Business client. Requires a paid subscription. Uses the jlesage/crashplan-pro container and is accessed via a web-based VNC client (port 5800).

5800.description: WebUI port (VNC over HTTP). Access the CrashPlan interface here.
5800.label: WebUI/Console Port

/config.description: Choose a share for the container's configuration files, logs, and cache.
/config.label: Configuration Share

/storage.description: This is where all your shares/data to be backed up should be mounted (e.g., set this to the parent share containing all your data). **NOTE: CrashPlan must be able to read this data.**
/storage.label: Data to Backup Volume (Read Only)

USER_ID.description: User ID that the application will run as (e.g., 1000). Must have permissions to read the data in the /storage volume.
USER_ID.label: User ID

GROUP_ID.description: Group ID that the application will run as (e.g., 1000).
GROUP_ID.label: Group ID
